snippet.title: The Invincible | Yasna Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Add The Invincible to your wishlist: https://re.11bits.com/czh

Learn about The Invincible’s main character Yasna, her motivations, and her interest in science over conquest. Her natural curiosity will soon lead her to rethink humanity’s ambitions and biases on Regis III.

“Yasna isn’t terrified by the cosmos, but rather amazed by the vision of its undiscovered phenomena. Her training as an astrobiologist helps her handle stress and maintain focus when she wakes up on the unknown planet without her crew and with holes in her memories. In the beginning, her professionalism and natural curiosity push her forward to look for answers and to successfully complete her mission. However, her attitude slowly changes throughout the game, as she is faced with morally difficult decisions and the realization that not everything, everywhere is for us”. - Magdalena Kucenty, Narrative Designer at Starward Industries.

#narrativegame #spacegame #scifigame #storyrich #choices #gametrailer #retrofuture
